prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a sleek body and vibrant wings.
Show me a Pokemon that has a stinger and can fly gracefully.
Design a Pokemon that is both intimidating and colorful, perfect for battles.
Imagine a small insectoid creature with bright yellow and black patterns.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a fierce personality.
Make a unique bug-type Pokemon that resembles a wasp with striking features.
